channel.title: Home on Socrates L.
channel.description: Recent content in Home on Socrates L.

item.title: Building My Personal Site with Hugo and Congo
item.description: In this technical deep dive, I document the process of constructing a personal website using Hugo, a high-performance static site generator, paired with the Congo theme—a minimalist, highly customizable theme.

item.title: Kubernetes Helm Chart for Mass Calculator
item.description: The Mass Calculator application represents a practical implementation of cloud-native technologies, focusing on modern development and deployment practices.
